1#include "dialog_ex.h"
2#include <gui/elements.h>
3#include <furi.h>
4
5struct DialogEx {
6 View* view;
7 void* context;
8 DialogExResultCallback callback;
9 bool enable_extended_events;
10};
11
12typedef struct {
13 const char* text;
14 uint8_t x;
15 uint8_t y;
16 Align horizontal;
17 Align vertical;
18} TextElement;
19
20typedef struct {
21 int8_t x;
22 int8_t y;
23 const Icon* icon;
24} IconElement;
25
26typedef struct {
27 TextElement header;
28 TextElement text;
29 IconElement icon;
30
31 const char* left_text;
32 const char* center_text;
33 const char* right_text;
34} DialogExModel;
35
36static void dialog_ex_view_draw_callback(Canvas* canvas, void* _model) {
37 DialogExModel* model = _model;
38
39 // Prepare canvas
40 canvas_clear(canvas);
41 canvas_set_color(canvas, ColorBlack);
42
43 if(model->icon.icon != NULL) {
44 canvas_draw_icon(canvas, model->icon.x, model->icon.y, model->icon.icon);
45 }
46
47 // Draw header
48 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontPrimary);
49 if(model->header.text != NULL) {
50 elements_multiline_text_aligned(
51 canvas,
52 model->header.x,
53 model->header.y,
54 model->header.horizontal,
55 model->header.vertical,
56 model->header.text);
57 }
58
59 // Draw text
60 canvas_set_font(canvas, FontSecondary);
61 if(model->text.text != NULL) {
62 elements_multiline_text_aligned(
63 canvas,
64 model->text.x,
65 model->text.y,
66 model->text.horizontal,
67 model->text.vertical,
68 model->text.text);
69 }
70
71 // Draw buttons
72 if(model->left_text != NULL) {
73 elements_button_left(canvas, model->left_text);
74 }
75
76 if(model->center_text != NULL) {
77 elements_button_center(canvas, model->center_text);
78 }
79
80 if(model->right_text != NULL) {
81 elements_button_right(canvas, model->right_text);
82 }
83}
84
85static bool dialog_ex_view_input_callback(InputEvent* event, void* context) {
86 DialogEx* dialog_ex = context;
87 bool consumed = false;
88 const char* left_text = NULL;
89 const char* center_text = NULL;
90 const char* right_text = NULL;
91
92 with_view_model(
93 dialog_ex->view,
94 DialogExModel * model,
95 {
96 left_text = model->left_text;
97 center_text = model->center_text;
98 right_text = model->right_text;
99 },
100 true);
101
102 if(dialog_ex->callback) {
103 if(event->type == InputTypeShort) {
104 if(event->key == InputKeyLeft && left_text != NULL) {
105 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExResultLeft, dialog_ex->context);
106 consumed = true;
107 } else if(event->key == InputKeyOk && center_text != NULL) {
108 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExResultCenter, dialog_ex->context);
109 consumed = true;
110 } else if(event->key == InputKeyRight && right_text != NULL) {
111 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExResultRight, dialog_ex->context);
112 consumed = true;
113 }
114 }
115
116 if(event->type == InputTypePress && dialog_ex->enable_extended_events) {
117 if(event->key == InputKeyLeft && left_text != NULL) {
118 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExPressLeft, dialog_ex->context);
119 consumed = true;
120 } else if(event->key == InputKeyOk && center_text != NULL) {
121 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExPressCenter, dialog_ex->context);
122 consumed = true;
123 } else if(event->key == InputKeyRight && right_text != NULL) {
124 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExPressRight, dialog_ex->context);
125 consumed = true;
126 }
127 }
128
129 if(event->type == InputTypeRelease && dialog_ex->enable_extended_events) {
130 if(event->key == InputKeyLeft && left_text != NULL) {
131 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExReleaseLeft, dialog_ex->context);
132 consumed = true;
133 } else if(event->key == InputKeyOk && center_text != NULL) {
134 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExReleaseCenter, dialog_ex->context);
135 consumed = true;
136 } else if(event->key == InputKeyRight && right_text != NULL) {
137 dialog_ex->callback(DialogExReleaseRight, dialog_ex->context);
138 consumed = true;
139 }
140 }
141 }
142
143 return consumed;
144}
145
146DialogEx* dialog_ex_alloc() {
147 DialogEx* dialog_ex = malloc(sizeof(DialogEx));
148 dialog_ex->view = view_alloc();
149 view_set_context(dialog_ex->view, dialog_ex);
150 view_allocate_model(dialog_ex->view, ViewModelTypeLocking, sizeof(DialogExModel));
151 view_set_draw_callback(dialog_ex->view, dialog_ex_view_draw_callback);
152 view_set_input_callback(dialog_ex->view, dialog_ex_view_input_callback);
153 with_view_model(
154 dialog_ex->view,
155 DialogExModel * model,
156 {
157 model->header.text = NULL;
158 model->header.x = 0;
159 model->header.y = 0;
160 model->header.horizontal = AlignLeft;
161 model->header.vertical = AlignBottom;
162
163 model->text.text = NULL;
164 model->text.x = 0;
165 model->text.y = 0;
166 model->text.horizontal = AlignLeft;
167 model->text.vertical = AlignBottom;
168
169 model->icon.x = 0;
170 model->icon.y = 0;
171 model->icon.icon = NULL;
172
173 model->left_text = NULL;
174 model->center_text = NULL;
175 model->right_text = NULL;
176 },
177 true);
178 dialog_ex->enable_extended_events = false;
179 return dialog_ex;
180}
181
182void dialog_ex_free(DialogEx* dialog_ex) {
183 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
184 view_free(dialog_ex->view);
185 free(dialog_ex);
186}
187
188View* dialog_ex_get_view(DialogEx* dialog_ex) {
189 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
190 return dialog_ex->view;
191}

193void dialog_ex_set_result_callback(DialogEx* dialog_ex, DialogExResultCallback callback) {
194 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
195 dialog_ex->callback = callback;
196}

198void dialog_ex_set_context(DialogEx* dialog_ex, void* context) {
199 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
200 dialog_ex->context = context;
201}

203void dialog_ex_set_header(
204 DialogEx* dialog_ex,
205 const char* text,
206 uint8_t x,
207 uint8_t y,
208 Align horizontal,
209 Align vertical) {
210 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
211 with_view_model(
212 dialog_ex->view,
213 DialogExModel * model,
214 {
215 model->header.text = text;
216 model->header.x = x;
217 model->header.y = y;
218 model->header.horizontal = horizontal;
219 model->header.vertical = vertical;
220 },
221 true);
222}

271 furi_assert(dialog_ex);

274}
275
276void dialog_ex_reset(DialogEx* dialog_ex) {
277 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
278 TextElement clean_text_el = {
279 .text = NULL, .x = 0, .y = 0, .horizontal = AlignLeft, .vertical = AlignLeft};
280 IconElement clean_icon_el = {.icon = NULL, .x = 0, .y = 0};
281 with_view_model(
282 dialog_ex->view,
283 DialogExModel * model,
284 {
285 model->header = clean_text_el;
286 model->text = clean_text_el;
287 model->icon = clean_icon_el;
288 model->left_text = NULL;
289 model->center_text = NULL;
290 model->right_text = NULL;
291 },
292 true);
293 dialog_ex->context = NULL;
294 dialog_ex->callback = NULL;
295}
296
297void dialog_ex_enable_extended_events(DialogEx* dialog_ex) {
298 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
299 dialog_ex->enable_extended_events = true;
300}
301
302void dialog_ex_disable_extended_events(DialogEx* dialog_ex) {
303 furi_assert(dialog_ex);
304 dialog_ex->enable_extended_events = false;
305}
